ygData.subject: Re: My (limited) exp with research:
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Most ( all? ) skills associated with lvls do not start at 1, many will give u a certain number of skill points depending on your lvl. In certain cases it
ygData.messageBody:
>
> How did you get your skill up from 1 to 47 as since level 16 to 19 I have not been allowed to train more than one
> point in the ability ?


Most ( all? ) skills associated with lvls do not start at 1, many will
give u a certain number of skill points depending on your lvl.
In certain cases it makes sense to not train a skill as soon as u attain
it.

But that is not what applies to me. i too only could put 1 training
point to start with, just that with more levels u r allowed to put more
points in.I started researching very late.Mainly i didnt want to waist
time with it ,till absolutely necessary.


Bull
